processingResourceMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.io.xml.XmlXPathReader
processingResourceMetaData.description:
A component reader for XML files implemented with XPath.

This is currently optimized for TREC format, which means the style topics are presented in. You should provide the parameter XPath expression that of the parent node And the child nodes of each parent node will be stored separately in its own CAS.

If your expression evaluates to leaf nodes, empty CASes will be created.

configurationParameter.name: rootXPath
configurationParameter.description: Specifies the XPath expression to all nodes to be processed. Different segments will be separated via PARAM_ID_TAG, and each segment will be stored in a separate CAS.

configurationParameter.name: includeTags
configurationParameter.description:
Tags which should be worked on. If empty then all tags will be processed.

If this and PARAM_EXCLUDE_TAGS are both provided, tags in set PARAM_INCLUDE_TAGS - PARAM_EXCLUDE_TAGS will be processed.

configurationParameter.name: excludeTags
configurationParameter.description:
Tags which should be ignored. If empty then all tags will be processed.

If this and PARAM_INCLUDE_TAGS are both provided, tags in set PARAM_INCLUDE_TAGS - PARAM_EXCLUDE_TAGS will be processed.

configurationParameter.name: language
configurationParameter.description: Language of the documents. If given, it will be set in each CAS.

configurationParameter.name: workingDir
configurationParameter.description:
Specify to substitute tag names in CAS.

Please give the substitutions each in before - after order. For example to substitute "foo" with "bar", and "hey" with "ho", you can provide { "foo", "bar", "hey", "ho" }.

configurationParameter.name: docIdTag
configurationParameter.description: Tag which contains the docId. If it is given, it will be ensured that within the same document there is only one id tag and it is not empty

configurationParameter.name: sourceLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location from which the input is read.

configurationParameter.name: patterns
configurationParameter.description: A set of Ant-like include/exclude patterns. A pattern starts with #INCLUDE_PREFIX [+] if it is an include pattern and with #EXCLUDE_PREFIX [-] if it is an exclude pattern. The wildcard /**/ can be used to address any number of sub-directories. The wildcard * can be used to a address a part of a name.

configurationParameter.name: caseSensitive
configurationParameter.description: States whether the matching is done case sensitive. (default: true)
